lead_paragraph: Bank stocks rose as first-quarter results trickled in, and airline stocks were up after Delta said the low cost of fuel had bolstered its business.

headline.print_headline: Banks and Airlines Rise as Most Shares Hardly Move
headline.main: Wall St. Little Changed Amid Earnings Reports

snippet: Bank stocks rose as first-quarter results trickled in, and airline stocks were up after Delta said the low cost of fuel had bolstered its business.
abstract: Stocks are mostly flat, as bank and airline shares rise.
